Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Room size was very small the bed cover was full of dust small tv bathroom and toilet were in two different rooms their resteraunt is not open 24 7 and when we ordered from a resteraunt to deliver at the hotel they charged us 20 euros

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Some bathroom fixtures to be checked
Positive_Review: Attentive personnel Comfortable sleeping accomodation Location of the Hotel near main entertainement and shopping facilities

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: We did not stay long enough to notice anything unconvenient
Positive_Review: The location could not have been better Staff was very kind and the room was clean We do not regret having chosen this hotel

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: We booked a package with breakfasts but got charged for the price difference between continental and buffet breakfasts The staff told us there are two kinds of breakfast and the package we booked only covers continental and since we had buffet we had to pay the difference This was never mentioned in Bookings coom and caused unexpected confusion The food is so so not much variety either
Positive_Review: Location is good walking distance to some attractions

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: There were scam artists on the Champs Elysee We were warned to keep our bags close but not about the hustlers Edith false charities etc
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent and very helpful even before I got there I called from Houston a few times and they were extremely helpful The location was excellent

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: I am a very passionate traveller and love spending time in good hotels watching tv till late night I was at warwick on the 3rd of may There was no electric supply for the whole night and we had to spend time in complete darkness It was a a really bad experience The hotel offered no compensation of any kind in return

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The best staff i ever seen every body smile and say bonjour all the time The location was great near the champ elyssee i recommand this hotel for all people here and of course i will come back again

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The hotel is nice and the location is great right in the heart of Paris Of course you pay for that but the cost is much less than larger hotel chains right around the block Worth the money simply for the location and staff

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: Very good location Also I would like to thank Sophia who is working in the reception She was kind and helpful and find a nice room to me even I come so early morning

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: There was unpleasant smell in the room and the bed We couldn t sleep well because of the noise outside the hotel
Positive_Review: A great location very friendly and professional staff

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Breakfast was lousy not at all good Very limited options Room service was not upto the mark Not enough anenities like shower gels shampoo etc provided

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: Got an upgrade to a bigger room with a balcony overlooking the champs elysee Amazing view and excellent staff The bathrooms are equipped with WC washing supplies The rooms are huge for Paris and the location is on the champs elysee street with department stores next to the hotel Will defintly go back

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Bathroom smells bad needs new furniture Pillows are too soft and air condition is not cold at all a c system has to be fixed
Positive_Review: Excellent and fast service you ask for anything the door will be knocked in a minute Very helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: Bed and pillows were very good Nice bathroom too Staff very helpful Location is par excellence for non business travellers

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: They didn t put free water in my room as hospitality and they put to my freind When I asked the reception about that he said it s the fourth visit for your and but my freind said it s his first Also they put a bill doesn t belong to me and i was suprised by it when i was checking out

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: To have more restaurant in the premises The seated area in the lobby is very little despite rhere is an empty area can be furnished under the mirror
Positive_Review: Thd warm welcome of the staff variety of food at the breakfast is quite enough The express check out service bill took no time to be ready settled

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: i have paid more for room with terrace and i got same with a wall view The room and facilities you will get is not valuable for amout you paied for

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The staff were so friendly ready to help and spoke fluent English which was great as my partner and I were worried we would struggle only knowing a little French

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The fact that the bathroom toilette is in a separate room than the main bathroom that has the washing basin and the bathtub which was not very practical or comfortable since you have to go from one room to another to wash your hands after using it If you are not staying with a close person this may become an issue especially if you are the kind who prefers to wash your hands before you pull up your pants Just joking LOL
Positive_Review: Location location location first It is right off the famous Champs Elysee i e a minute away and a few steps to George V metro station which is directly connected to the bigger Charles De Gaule station which has the RER It is also close to a lot of very good restaurants and cafes including the famous Georges V with its tasty hot chocolate and desserts and shopping centers as Monoprix Zara H and M Sephora and great brands as Kenzo and Louis Vuitton The room size was good for a family of 3 We took the Executive room that had a queen sized bed that was comfortable in addition to a double sized sofa bed that can accomodate 2 We were shown the Junior suite which was bigger and had on top a small dinning table but it turned out to be a 100 euros more expensive per night and frankly did not think it was worth it especially since we were not planning to eat in the room The heating system worked very well which was a blessing since the temperature was around 1 C i e it was freezing The room had a very good sized closet an easy to use safe and a small fridge It had also a writing table and a chair and enough space for the lauggage The bathroom though was a little impractical since the toilette was in a separate room than the washing basin and the bathtub but the size was great and spacy and the magnifiying mirror was well located something of prime importance to me and my daughters to apply makeup easily The room lighting was good though it could be made better since you need to put each light on or off separately There was a little issue with the electricity sockets which were in impractical places and we had to go down to plug our phone chargers and i believe they should have been placed in a higher locations to give people easier access Also i realized unfortunately too late that the plugs located near the room entrance will shut down once the main corridor lamp is turned off i

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The AC not great in the room too hot
Positive_Review: Excellent staff greeting and upgraded without question due to the amount of luggage we were carrying as we were driving through Europe skiing The hotels suggestion

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: To have to wait for our breakfast because too many clients and not enough sitting space for everybody
Positive_Review: Location and breakfast The help and smile of the personnel

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: We had five rooms and one of them was on the 1st floor above the nightclub the base was very loud until 5am and we should have been warned We would make sure we were not on that floor next time
Positive_Review: Convenience of location very good staff

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The receptionist did not agree for early check in although the rooms were available and I requested this early They promised upon availability Also she asked me the credit card and I told her to charge the amount from the same amount reserved on time of reservation She promised to do that but she reserved another amount On the time of check out her colleague informed me that she don t need to do that because the amount reserved in reservation is enough You know while traveling you don t want extra reserving with your credit card

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Some confusion about the booking I have been billed twice Have received emails about a no show which did not happen and I was charged one day extra currently lodged a complaint and hope it gets sorted out soon and amount reversed
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel is great Staff though very busy were quite helpful The rooms are comfortable

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Would like more places to hang our clothes and towels But his is minor
Positive_Review: Great location In the middle of everything and close to subway Free breakfast tastes great

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The lift is a bit confusing but does it job
Positive_Review: The staffs are very friendly and helpful while the hotel location is superb Breakfast is good and the room is perfect

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: We were made to wait to check in probably because the hotel is very busy
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel is great Breakfast could be better with more variety Hotel staff is very friendly

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Staff inside the the Resaurant Bath room very small bad smell They cut from card the money twice Up to now not return the rest of my money

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Breakfast was pretty good but no surprise considering its price 24 Euro which was not included in the fare Sometimes room cleaning came lately in weekday When I backed to the room in 5 PM one day it was still not finished Besides after I had been out for dinner the room was cleaned again in the evening I m not for sure the reason
Positive_Review: It was located in very convenient place close to Arc de triomphe 2 metro stations George V and Franklin D Roosevelt are available

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The localization of the hotel is very good and nearby from every important place only few meters to Avenue Champs Elys e Louise was very kindly and helpfull on the reception Splendid selection at breakfast buffet The executive room was spacious with marble bathroom

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Below Avg Breakfast Private Toilet unconventional for Muslims
Positive_Review: Amazing Staff excellent and free WiFi private balcony personally they ve prepared the room with flowers and welcome drinks and snakes as it was my Honeymoon

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: I thought hotel is newer than this the bad thing is there is rats mice in the basement wile we are having our breakfast we informed the staff but when I left it still there its really disgusting one of the staff lady Speaks mockingly It Mickey Mouse
Positive_Review: most of the staff are friendly and helpful our housekeeping was perfect lady

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The view of the Hotel is not good The facility is not extra comfort just fair The breakfast is not so good The rooms do not have enough light
Positive_Review: The Bed was good The room was clean The location of the hotel is perfect

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Nothing all is perfect but the hair dryer and the iron need improving
Positive_Review: The room are quite big beds are big too and the breakfast is amazing very friendly atmosphere and the location is in the heart of champ Elysees

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: There were nothing we didn t like
Positive_Review: Excellent location in walking distance of everything large room and nice breakfast included wi fi and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Had asked for quiet room booked a deluxe king size room and was told it would be on one of the upper floors and over the garden i e Quiet On arrival told we had an upgrade to much larger room etc This was on floor 2 and over entrance on main road Was awake from 4 6am due to people loudly arguing outside and earlier traffic noise gave disturbed sleep Position of dining room in basement see what did you like comments On request was given a new room in terms of original booking which was very quiet on floor 4 overlooking garden Did feel that a day of our holiday was lost Was this a genuine upgrade or due to lack of available room as per booking Two electric bulbs not working hence poor lighting and bath plug didn t work hence no bath Sink plug didn t work but we repaired that Room size very adequate and comfortable which would have been enhanced by a second easy chair Turn down service a nice touch but why only on 3 nights A drawer on bedside table would be useful
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed and efficient air conditioning Excellent breakfast buffet Pleasant and efficient reception and foyer staff Very pleasant breakfast room on ground floor for our last breakfast

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Had to pay more eventually cuz a baby isnt free even though he sleeps with us in the same bed they charged us for a deluxe room
Positive_Review: chic the hallways smell delicious breakfast is nice reception isnt that friendly but then again the whole of france is like that the room isnt that small as other hotels and best of all the location

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: Nice clean quite and big room in an excellent location in Paris Amazing and helpful staff ready to help you any time good breakfast Excellent concierge Affordable and good price in a prime location just few steps to be in the middle of Champs Elysees and George V metro station This hotel is highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The breakfast have to change the menu every day for the change of the customs
Positive_Review: The hotel is good but want to check the cleaning of the bed Some time was flies on the room

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: We are usually traveling to Paris 2 3 times a year for business and leisure We have stayed in much smaller hotels typical of Paris too but our stay at Warwick was our worst ever stay in the last 18 years The name is too big for this hotel with Zero standard We were in a Deluxe room with extremely dirty curtains walls and bathroom The curtain walls and ceiling had dirt marks of insect killed on them that were not removed The phones in the room were not working The pop up blockers in bathtub and wash basin could not be opened but to be removed ON 4TH NIGHT MY WIFE WAS SCREAMING OF SEEING A COACKROACH IN THE BATHROOM We complained about hygiene and poor condition of room the next morning in the afternoon we noticed the cleaners had not properly vacuumed and cleaned the room and even intentionally left bunches of hairs on table wash basin and bed So rude Even scattered our slippers on the floor After our complain and opposition we were moved to an executive room which was a bit less outdated but strangely the cleaning and room maintain service was completely different In our 8 night stay we could finally sleep 2 night a bit comfortable The breakfast dishes are mostly dirty with food and oil stains This hotel is suffering of a serious hygiene issues I do not recommend this hotel to anyone expecting stay in a starred hotel It can be a cheap dirty hostel
Positive_Review: The only positive point of this hotel is location although the homeless man sleeping off the street was also enjoying the same location as us but we paid Euro 220 nigh that he did not Good for him

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Restaurant is closed on the weekends but room service is available
Positive_Review: 5 minutes from Arc de Triomphe and just off the Champs Elys e We had a private balcony with a view of the top 3rd of the Eiffel Tower Expensive to stay here if you just turn up but we saved 50 using this site

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Bathroom toiletries only for one person though it was clear there were two people in the room and nothing was replenished on the last day night We ran out of tissues and almost toilet rolls Check in very pleasant helpful receptionist but checkout was very different another receptionist left us for over five minutes deciding to deal with another customer who was a distance away from the reception area with his wife because he asked her a question about the contents of a box he was holding Meanwhile my credit card was being processed the amount was charged in the wrong currency I felt very concerned for the security of my card as during this long period while the receptionist was away I could not see my card and there were other customers hanging around the reception area On her return I expressed my concern and the currency error but her explanation was not satisfactory and to placate me she offered the hotel pen as I left which naturally I declined
Positive_Review: Great location breakfast fair choice except scrambled eggs too runny for my taste Beds comfortable and well presented interior Tea and coffee making facilities everything clean and tidy in the room

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Breakfast staff were a bit unhappy and the timing of breakfast was quick till 10 am if it was 10 30 will be better They don t accept any food to bring from outside resturants what if I have children and they don t eat but particular things or Somone can t eat any kind of food must be something particular
Positive_Review: The location was amazing and the staff were welcoming

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Bed size too small for 2 persons cushions not comfortable curtains need to be replaced Improve cleanliness of facilities such as the hair dryer hose Improve speed of responding to complaints

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was perfect for a family traveling as tourists to Paris Being near to Champs Elysee provided us with that extra zing and taste of the parisien life after a full day

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Breakfast was cold even 30 minutes after opening poor hot plates to maintain the heat of the food The hotel restaurant and bar was closed at weekends
Positive_Review: The location was excellent and the concierge and staff were very helpful in arranging transport and activities bookings

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Noisy when you open windows being centrally located
Positive_Review: Centrally located if you want to be near Champs Elysses good breakfast clean and very reasonably priced Near shopping area

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: Good location very comfortable bed and pillows Staff organised a bottle of Champagne and macaroons on arrival to celebrate my husband s 60th Birthday We had a room with a terrace which was a big plus

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The fact that the hotel stole 200 euros from us and have refused to answer our emails When we booked in we were told that the cost of the accommodation would be held plus 200 euros for any extra expenses If we paid on the same card when we checked out the 200 euros would go straight back in It did not and the full amount of 1 482 euros was kept even though we had a written quote for 1 280 euros for accommodation and did not use any other of the hotel facilities The cost was one of the reasons we chose the hotel in the first place Had we known they were going to keep the equivalent of another night s accommodation we would not have chosen them In spite of contacting both the hotel and booking com nothing has been done about it This is theft pure and simple and booking com as we booked through you you are resposible Also we were asked if we had any special requests We requested a quiet non smoking room and guess what We were put right next to the lift Great service I do intend to pursue getting our money back by whatever means possible I believe the Warwick is one of a chain of hotels and if we have to go straight to the top man we will

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: My wife and I went for the football and found the location of this hotel great for taking in the sites and being able to spend more money than planned in the shops

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: During breakfast you must pay extra if you want to change the type of eggs Example fried eggs you must be extra Ommlett must be extra This is never happen to me before Could be the French rules for breakfast

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: the room is just a little bit a small but its fine
Positive_Review: the staff were friendly and helpful luxurios rooms with good AC the toilet is provided with water hose and that s is a most for some ppl the location is just view meters from the champs the parking is just near by the hotel and there is a lift inside the hotel for it

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: I don t think the staff was very welcoming or nice Actually when we arrived there were 4 of us because one of my kids was staying with my mom in another hotel but I wanted to check in first Since the room was only for three they were claiming that we were 4 and not 3 and although I let them know my older son was not staying in the hotel they were doubtful about it and rude They cleaned our room very late although we usually would go out before 10am Overall it was clean but the toilet had stains it is old but they need to change it because it looks dirty We left glasses with water or juice and when we came back they were still there the cleaning lady would not take them away which is also not very thoughtful or clean
Positive_Review: The location is great literally a couple of steps from Champs Elysees The room is nice and bathroom is very big which is a plus in Paris where they usually have tiny spaces The toilet is in a separate space than the shower which is also great

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Worst experience using Booking com Booking recommended a Deluxe King Room to me for 2 adults and 2 children however when I arrived at the hotel they told me I can t stay in that room because We have 4 people even though my little daughter is only 8 months old I have to upgrade the room to a Junior Suite and cost me 200 euros more It s a terrible experience and I contacted Booking right away but got no reply until now 12 days passed

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Not nearly enough pillows And it seemed rather pricey but I guess you pay for the location
Positive_Review: The view from the roof top bar was excellent and the food very good

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: A little bit expensive A room a little bit small
Positive_Review: Great location near Champs Elysees avenue where all the shops and restaurants are George V metro station is close by Arc de Triomphe is also within walking distance If you like cabaret Lido is also near by

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The service in the restaurant should improved when the breakfast buffet almost closed since staff took away my dishes and spoon when I need to eat the fruit on the table i need to take another spoon from buffet area but the staff just told me buffet are closed I noticed the time and wasn t going to take any food in the buffet area but they didn t known guest s intention and thought I want to take food plus the food was still there Which made me very uncomfortable I wish service really need to be improved if hotel wants to have good reputation and sustainable development in hotel industry
Positive_Review: Honestly everything was perfect EXCEPT the service attitude of receptionist a lady is very bad impatient and rude for instance I called reception she didn t wait for I finished talking just closed the phone which was really shocked me When I came down for asking some question and check out she was super impatient and bad attitude Well I m a student from hospitality and as the knowledge I ve got from school should not be like this such a good hotel with this bad staff I had very bad impression about that Hopefully she could improve the service attitude trying to be nicer to the guest Because the guests deserve basic respect since we paid much money

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: I don t like the view of the room small lobby
Positive_Review: Excellent location good breakfast u can buy a SIM card ticket for tour in the city and in the river from concierge desk

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Doorman don t really help us to carry the luggage and the entrance door is quite heavy to pull
Positive_Review: The location is really good I like the toilet room size and decoration

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Nothing Would have liked order an egg of my choice at breakfast But otherwise the selection is quite reasonable
Positive_Review: Everything about the hotel Hospitality was great which is very unusual for Paris Concierge is exceptional Room very comfortable Very close to the Champs Elysee

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The staff were super hospitable friendly cheerful and very helpful I recall yoaan on reception his female colleague very helpful cheerful manner an attitude rarely to find in other paris hotels we visited in the past This friendly attitude led us to reserve again for three night in September 2016

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: Hotel stuff always were ready for our help Consierge team was excellent We stayed there for honeymoon They upgrated our room Also Housekeeping team made littile surprise for us

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: It was incredibly noisy We heard sirens and horns all night and couldn t sleep I was very glad to leave and that we were only there one night The room also smelled like stale cigarette smoke even though it was a nonsmoking room Aesthetics and services were great but the rest was a major blow to the experience
Positive_Review: Bed was comfy Room was spacious

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The female concierge was uninterested forgot to book our taxi didnt return our calls when she said she would Poor customer service from this staff member Paying for our stay was inefficient and was very convoluted
Positive_Review: Bascially the location was the main attraction to this hotel

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The staff behavior was excellent there is one I think his outstanding Antonne he was advising about the good locations for me with lots of support

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The bed is comfortable the bedcover is very fluffy We found the Makkah direction in the drawer which is a nice surprise for us and highly appreciated The food room dining is excellent You mention which menu contain pork is also highly appreciated All in all we are very happy to stay in Warwick Hotel made our days in Paris more enjoyable

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Only complaint is we asked for an iron and it never came Had to ask again and that time they brought it to the room Very minor complaint given the rest of the experience at this hotel The location is great to get around the city but Champs Elysees doesn t offer many great affordable food choices within walking distance Most of the restaurants cafes are either outrageously expensive or not very good Suggest researching and venturing out of the area for that
Positive_Review: Excellent stay Location was great for sight seeing and right near a subway station making it easy to get around the city Person at the front desk was lovely and upgraded us to a deluxe room free of charge The bed was incredibly comfortable Hotel is nice and seemed very clean

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The view I had an internal view Not good The breakfast is good but too expensive
Positive_Review: Comfortable A lot of space in the room Location Overall very nice hotel

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The card keys didn t always work in the lift but not a big deal
Positive_Review: Breakfast was very good and a lovely treat served up to our room Why on earth would you go downstairs for breakfast when you could eat it on your own private sunny balcony The room was a good size very clean and all the amenities were what one would wish for On the first night we ate in the Warwick s a la carte restaurant the food was delicious and the service was excellent thoroughly recommend it as it was one of the finest meals we ate in Paris that weekend S

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: This is not my first time staying in Paris but it will be my last staying at hotel Warwick Reasons Extermily small rooms even for Paris standards the bed is only size queen made sleeping uncomfortable The shower was just bad Pricy for the level of the hotel
Positive_Review: Good location one minute walking to champs elysees

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: This hotel is different from everything it s unique special comfortable secure I always book at this hotel and I always been welcomed from the concierges receptionists cleaners Everyone welcoming me with beautiful smile that make so happy and made my begging of the day with smile Thank you so much Warwick champs lysee hotel in Paris Special thanks goes to Sophie and taha the receptionist and also Caroline the manager of reception Thank you

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Some staff members a little not customer friendly Bar could opened latter at night
Positive_Review: Rooms very clean and very confortable Great location to the city

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: excellent breakfast choice 24 euro a tad expensive but all you could wish for was there fantastic location excellent friendly staff they really look after you

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: The general attitude of all the staff was faultless exceptionally polite and helpful at all times Fantastic locations smack bang on the Champs and really clean comfy room with a decent breakfast buffet Hard to fault

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: we felt the music from the night club in the room it was a bit loud
Positive_Review: outstanding location and a beautiful hotel with a remarkable clean and fresh feeling

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: One of the things which i didnt like it is that i have to pay 20 dollors if i want to buy a food from outside the hotel and eat it in my room
Positive_Review: Just a location and the lovely staff

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: If you want check in early make sure that the hotel will take an advantage of you in my case the Receptionist Sofia almost forced me to upgrade my room for the whole stay to benefit from the early check in and the discounted rate of the upgrade although when i checked online i found availability of room the same type of my original booking and also i found a cheaper rate for the upgraded room the Receptionist claimed it was discounted Rooms facing the street are very noisey because of the night club near the hotel Internet signal is weak in the room My honest opinion is to book in California Champs Ely ees hotel
Positive_Review: Location close to Champs Ely se The cleanliness of the room

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: There was nothing special for the honeymoon couple as we thought of There was nothing complementary too as we were there for our honeymoon though we choosed your property out of all

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The only issue we had was on arrival being forced to purchase a second room Booking booked our room for four and the hotel didn t allow 4 in that particular room It was money we didn t plan on spending and was a huge bummer
Positive_Review: The staff was amazing and couldn t have been more helpful The location was perfect and our trip was anazing We d certainly stay here again

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The furniture is a little bit old And all standard rooms have bad views Also the toilet seat is separated from the whole washroom which was a bit of a hassle But all these are tiny infront of its benefits Its a little bit expensive but I think for Paris prices this is normal
Positive_Review: Location is the best part Also the staff is very welcoming and helpful The AC was not working in our room and in seconds after we complained they changed the room and upgraded it which was amazig

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Staff at reception especialy the dupty manager lady she was very rude I made my reservation included breakfast but at checkin time i have been told that your reservation without breakfast

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Poor free WiFi connection is too slow for European standard For some reasons they refused to pack our earlier breakfast We have to checked out at 5am
Positive_Review: Location and upgraded into balcony Big room nice breakfast

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Positive_Review: Fantastic location Very helpful staff excellent advice from concierge and reception personnel We included breakfast in our deal and elected to have room service no extra charge for full breakfast which was beautifully presented Hamburgers ordered in room late at night were fab too Great long weekend

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: 1 Check in was 15 00 hrs but the room was not ready until after 16 00 hrs 2 On sunday morning just after 08 00 we hade a breakfast but the food was very cold
Positive_Review: Everything was very good very friendly and warm staff

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Noisy at night from outside tired rooms ours had ripped curtains and scuffs on the walls and a loose socket did not fix issues in rooms when asked to
Positive_Review: Good food location near to Metro George V conierge very helpful

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Payment method wasn t very clear Before check in they block for an authorization 250Euros at the check in itself had to make an another authorization of 200Euros plus 50euros cash deposit During check out I was asked to pay the total amount of my room which I didn t understand as they already had the money blocked from my credit card to their account Anyway they kept saying those were just authorization so let s see Other than that room was very small they confirmed at the check in for a superior double room but was surprise to see such an small one when I open my door

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The breakfast was really not good and there were not many options The Wifi is completely bad and it had been disconnected most of the time
Positive_Review: Amazing location just a few steps from avenue Champs Elysees The staff were very helpful and friendly Strongly recommended for a short visit in Paris

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The hotel is a bit more old and I did not feel it was clean enough For the bathroom instead of a bath tube the shower would be more conveniant

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The room stunk of cigarette smoke It was terrible The housekeeper Brough an ioniser and told u it would clear the smell in one hour It didn t Even the towels in the bathroom smelt of smoke It was disgusting We didn t arrive until late and my wife and son just wanted to rest and not move again We went to the bar and ordered some food The food was good as was the service Upon presentation of the bill the food was double the price of what it stated on the menu I questions this and was given a different menu I told the barman that was not the menu he gave me After being looked at and spoken to like an idiot we found the correct menu He then told me that this menu changed three months ago He offered to split the difference in cost as a gesture of good will Really Aftef much shrugging and telling me itvwasnt his fault he allowed off one one meal which almost out balanced the cost I didn t even ask to compare the wine costs which I m sure we re charged at the new price too At check out when asked if I enjoyed the stay I replied not really and was given an am so sorry to hear that and asked nothing further Overall so very poor
Positive_Review: We made a late booking to stay in Paris I booked an exec room as my son was with us Apart from a really good check in and welcome the rest was poor

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: Food in the hotel was really pricey but there are plenty of options nearby
Positive_Review: The location is really good We were surprised with a bottle of champagne for our anniversary which was a lovely thought Rooms were comfortable

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: I have stayed on the hotel before but something is wrong now the staff in general became quit rude and not cooperative one particular is an east European lady who was one of the rudest hotel staff that I have ever meet not friendly and deliberately being difficult if customer service is import to you don t stay on the hotel

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: The receptionist was very rude she seems to enjoy making things difficult for customers we stayed one adult and one child and they charged tax for 2 Adults even though they can see its one adult it s not the money as much as how rude she was and unfriendly

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: It is best if the hotel can cooperate with interparking and provide cheaper rate for clients
Positive_Review: Very convenient hotel with excellent service very comfortable facilities and beside parking area

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
Negative_Review: one female staff in the reception wasn t clear with the stay cost and tax she was trying to let me pay more if I didn t discuss with her Toilet water was weak Wife was so slow Also I asked to change the pillow cause it was smelling bad but the room service ignored me twice In general customer service needs to be developed

Hotel_Name: Warwick Paris Former Warwick Champs Elysees
